mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, CHANGE_BEFORE_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS changeBeforeAssetSeqNo, CHANGE_AFTER_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS changeAfterAssetSeqNo, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CHANGE_DATETIME AS changeDatetime FROM ATMS_02001230

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, CHANGE_BEFORE_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS changeBeforeAssetSeqNo, CHANGE_AFTER_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS changeAfterAssetSeqNo, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CHANGE_DATETIME AS changeDatetime FROM ATMS_02001230 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001230 SET CHANGE_BEFORE_ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{changeBeforeAssetSeqNo}, CHANGE_AFTER_ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{changeAfterAssetSeqNo}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CHANGE_DATETIME = #{changeDatetime} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001230 ( TX_ID, CHANGE_BEFORE_ASSET_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_AFTER_ASSET_SEQ_NO, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, CHANGE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{changeBeforeAssetSeqNo}, #{changeAfterAssetSeqNo}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{changeDatetime} )
